long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the next level of tag in Tag 2! Avoid being caught with the bomb when time's up. Utilize portals, bouncy pads, and speedy reflexes to outsmart the pursuer. Take on the intense Zombie mode for an extra challenge. Unlock diverse Runners, tackle daily quests, and invite friends for chaotic multiplayer mayhem!
